00020 #ifndef OPENRAVE_COLLISIONCHECKER_H
00021 #define OPENRAVE_COLLISIONCHECKER_H
00022 
00023 namespace OpenRAVE {
00024 
00026 enum CollisionOptions
00027 {
00028     CO_Distance = 1, 
00029     CO_UseTolerance = 2, 
00030     CO_Contacts = 4, 
00031     CO_RayAnyHit = 8, 
00032 
00039     CO_ActiveDOFs = 16,
00040 };
00041 
00043 enum CollisionAction
00044 {
00045     CA_DefaultAction = 0, 
00046     CA_Ignore = 1, 
00047 };
00048 
00050 class OPENRAVE_API CollisionReport
00051 {
00052 public:
00053     CollisionReport() {
00054         Reset();
00055     }
00056 
00057     class OPENRAVE_API CONTACT
00058     {
00059 public:
00060         CONTACT() : depth(0) {
00061         }
00062         CONTACT(const Vector &p, const Vector &n, dReal d) : pos(p), norm(n) {
00063             depth = d;
00064         }
00065 
00066         Vector pos;  
00067         Vector norm; 
00068         dReal depth; 
00069     };
00070 
00071     int options; 
00072 
00073     KinBody::LinkConstPtr plink1, plink2; 
00074 
00075     //KinBody::Link::GeomConstPtr pgeom1, pgeom2; ///< the specified geometries hit for the given links
00076     int numCols; 
00077     std::vector<KinBody::LinkConstPtr> vLinkColliding; 
00078 
00079     dReal minDistance; 
00080     int numWithinTol; 
00081 
00082     std::vector<CONTACT> contacts; 
00083 
00084     virtual void Reset(int coloptions = 0);
00085     virtual std::string __str__() const;
00086 };
00087 
00088 typedef CollisionReport COLLISIONREPORT RAVE_DEPRECATED;
00089 
00093 class OPENRAVE_API CollisionCheckerBase : public InterfaceBase
00094 {
00095 public:
00096     CollisionCheckerBase(EnvironmentBasePtr penv) : InterfaceBase(PT_CollisionChecker, penv) {
00097     }
00098     virtual ~CollisionCheckerBase() {
00099     }
00100 
00102     static inline InterfaceType GetInterfaceTypeStatic() {
00103         return PT_CollisionChecker;
00104     }
00105 
00107     virtual bool SetCollisionOptions(int collisionoptions) = 0;
00108 
00110     virtual int GetCollisionOptions() const = 0;
00111 
00112     virtual void SetTolerance(dReal tolerance) = 0;
00113 
00115     virtual bool InitKinBody(KinBodyPtr pbody) = 0;
00116 
00118     virtual bool Enable(KinBodyConstPtr pbody, bool bEnable) RAVE_DEPRECATED = 0;
00119 
00122     virtual bool EnableLink(KinBody::LinkConstPtr pbody, bool bEnable) = 0;
00123 
00127 
00128 
00130     virtual bool CheckCollision(KinBodyConstPtr pbody1, CollisionReportPtr report = CollisionReportPtr())=0;
00131 
00133     virtual bool CheckCollision(KinBodyConstPtr pbody1, KinBodyConstPtr pbody2, CollisionReportPtr report = CollisionReportPtr())=0;
00134 
00136     virtual bool CheckCollision(KinBody::LinkConstPtr plink, CollisionReportPtr report = CollisionReportPtr())=0;
00137 
00139     virtual bool CheckCollision(KinBody::LinkConstPtr plink1, KinBody::LinkConstPtr plink2, CollisionReportPtr report = CollisionReportPtr())=0;
00140 
00142     virtual bool CheckCollision(KinBody::LinkConstPtr plink, KinBodyConstPtr pbody, CollisionReportPtr report = CollisionReportPtr())=0;
00143 
00145     virtual bool CheckCollision(KinBody::LinkConstPtr plink, const std::vector<KinBodyConstPtr>& vbodyexcluded, const std::vector<KinBody::LinkConstPtr>& vlinkexcluded, CollisionReportPtr report = CollisionReportPtr())=0;
00146 
00148     virtual bool CheckCollision(KinBodyConstPtr pbody, const std::vector<KinBodyConstPtr>& vbodyexcluded, const std::vector<KinBody::LinkConstPtr>& vlinkexcluded, CollisionReportPtr report = CollisionReportPtr())=0;
00149 
00155     virtual bool CheckCollision(const RAY& ray, KinBody::LinkConstPtr plink, CollisionReportPtr report = CollisionReportPtr()) = 0;
00156 
00162     virtual bool CheckCollision(const RAY& ray, KinBodyConstPtr pbody, CollisionReportPtr report = CollisionReportPtr()) = 0;
00163 
00169     virtual bool CheckCollision(const RAY& ray, CollisionReportPtr report = CollisionReportPtr()) = 0;
00170 
00171 protected:
00174     virtual bool InitEnvironment() = 0;
00175 
00178     virtual void DestroyEnvironment() = 0;
00179 
00183     virtual bool CheckSelfCollision(KinBodyConstPtr pbody, CollisionReportPtr report = CollisionReportPtr()) = 0;
00184 
00185     virtual void SetCollisionData(KinBodyPtr pbody, UserDataPtr data) {
00186         pbody->SetCollisionData(data);
00187     }
00188 
00189     inline CollisionCheckerBasePtr shared_collisionchecker() {
00190         return boost::static_pointer_cast<CollisionCheckerBase>(shared_from_this());
00191     }
00192     inline CollisionCheckerBaseConstPtr shared_collisionchecker_const() const {
00193         return boost::static_pointer_cast<CollisionCheckerBase const>(shared_from_this());
00194     }
00195 
00196 private:
00197     virtual const char* GetHash() const {
00198         return OPENRAVE_COLLISIONCHECKER_HASH;
00199     }
